title: B.P. Vegetarian Food
description: A shop lot that serves vegetarian food. There's a stall that serves plenty of prepared dishes for dine in or takeaways, aka "economy rice" in certain parts of Asia. There's another one that serves fried dishes, including fried pastas. 5-minute walk from i-Residence Hotel to this place - walk out to the main road, turn left, and at the first junction, turn left again.
